page.title: 03The Silk Mill.
page.content: The Silk Mill stands on it's own island in the middle of the River Test and there has been a mill there for many hundreds of years.At the end of the last century the Hide family bought the mill and they introduced a new industry to the town,the spinning of Momme Silk. The silk now used at the mill comes from China and Japan.Several weights of cloth are now made,from the lightweight cloth for scarves to the heavier material used for the black gowns worn by barristers. The building is three storeys high with a small bell tower and is faced with brick.It was built in the late eighteenth century.There is a small shop there where you can buy some of the material that they produce.The mill is to close this year in October.
